Package controllers

Interface BirdController

  • public interface BirdController
    This interfaces initializes and controls the Rectangle of the bird's view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void birdMovement​(double n)
      Call Bird.birdUpdate(Rectangle, double) and BirdView.updatePosition(double) for define bird movement.
      boolean floorCollision​(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle r)
      Boolean method that return true if the bird touch the floor.
      model.bird.Bird getBirdModel()
      Get the Model of bird.
      view.BirdView getBirdView()
      Get the View of bird.
      void setBirdView()
      Call BirdView method and set the view of bird.

    • Method Detail

      • setBirdView

        void setBirdView()
        Call BirdView method and set the view of bird.

      • birdMovement

        void birdMovement​(double n)
        Call Bird.birdUpdate(Rectangle, double) and BirdView.updatePosition(double) for define bird movement.
        Parameters:
        n - Constant defined in GameLoopImpl, set the increase of pixel at each loop.

      • floorCollision

        boolean floorCollision​(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle r)
        Boolean method that return true if the bird touch the floor.
        Parameters:
        r - Rectangle initialize in BirdView constructor
        Returns:
        true

      • getBirdView

        view.BirdView getBirdView()
        Get the View of bird.
        Returns:
        BirdView Object type

      • getBirdModel

        model.bird.Bird getBirdModel()
        Get the Model of bird.
        Returns:
        BirdModel Object type
